item.description:
The annual Boston Demons Grand Final party will be held at the Phoenix Landing pub at 512 Massachusetts Ave in Central Sq at 2.30pm on Sept 26.

This location is easily accessible to public transport (central sq T) and the pub has a big screen and also more than enough flat screen TVs around the bar that will be showing the game. The game this year will also be televised on ESPN2 so we are hoping for a High Def coverage.

The usual $20 donation to the Demons Nationals Campaign gets you in the door which includes a free meat pie, beer and a coopers beer stubbie holder (coosie) or hat and get in early as there is limited seating at the bar, standing room a plenty but as there is a ton of TVs around the bar viewing will be plentiful.

The usual giveaways and raffle will be happening with some pretty cool prizes to be had including Celtics Tix (great seats) Aussie food and wine hamper and other fun stuff along with the electrifying atmosphere of that last day in September!

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: AFL Grand Final Party
